scripts.docker:build: cd ops/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml build
scripts.docker:up: cd ops/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml up -d
scripts.docker:down: cd ops/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml down
scripts.docker:logs: cd ops/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml logs -f
scripts.docker:ps: cd ops/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml ps
scripts.docker:restart: cd ops/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml restart
scripts.docker:clean: cd ops/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml down -v
